title: Riot please fix this :(
body: I had just gotten into a game as lulu, but nobody's health bar was showing up. I left the game and tried to reconnect but it took forever to load for some reason. When I got back into the game, my team had remaked and I lost **19 LP** :( _ Please fix the health bar bug so people don't lose LP._

replies.body: Hmmmm it kinda sounds like some of those files bugged out on you, possibly due to a hiccup in your connection during the patch. No worries, I'd run a quick repair to make sure the game files are working properly, but since you left the game and were gone long enough to be marked as afk, we can't restore that LP.
